trans-unit.source: ban is whether to ban or unban the key. (Required | Bool)
trans-unit.target: ban 是禁止还是取消禁止的关键。（必需| Bool ）

trans-unit.source: binary is the buffer associated with the payload. (Binary Str)
trans-unit.target: binary 是与有效负载关联的缓冲区。（二进制 Str ）

trans-unit.source: changes is whether to subscribe to presence changes on the channel. (Optional | Bool | Default: False)
trans-unit.target: changes 是是否订阅频道上的状态更改。（可选| Bool |默认值： False ）

trans-unit.source: channel is the channel name of which you want to call the presence. (Required | Str)
trans-unit.target: channel 是您要呼叫其状态的频道名称。（必需| Str ）

trans-unit.source: channel is the channel name the message was published to. (Str)
trans-unit.target: channel 是消息发布到的渠道名称。（ Str ）

trans-unit.source: channel is the channel name to generate a key for. (Required | Str)
trans-unit.target: channel 是为其生成密钥的频道名称。（必需| Str ）

trans-unit.source: channel is the channel name to publish to. (Required | Str)
trans-unit.target: channel 是要发布到的频道名称。（必需| Str ）

trans-unit.source: channel is the channel name to subscribe to. (Required | Str)
trans-unit.target: channel 是要订阅的频道名称。（必需| Str ）

trans-unit.source: channel is the channel name to unsubscribe from. (Required | Str)
trans-unit.target: channel 是要取消订阅的频道名称。（必需| Str ）

trans-unit.source: channel is the channel name.
trans-unit.target: channel 是频道名称。

trans-unit.source: channel is the channel name. (Required | Str)
trans-unit.target: channel 是频道名称。（必需| Str ）

trans-unit.source: e for extend
trans-unit.target: e 为扩展

trans-unit.source: event is the event type: subscribe when an remote instance subscribed to the channel, unsubscribe when an remote instance unsubscribed from the channel and status when Emitter#presence() is called the first time.
trans-unit.target: event 是事件类型： subscribe 当一个远程实例订阅的信道， unsubscribe 时从信道和一个取消订阅远程实例 status 时 Emitter#presence() 被称为第一次。

trans-unit.source: host is the address of the Emitter broker. (Optional | Str | Default: "api.emitter.io")
trans-unit.target: host 是Emitter代理的地址。（可选| Str |默认： "api.emitter.io" ）

trans-unit.source: id is an internal generated id of the remote instance.
trans-unit.target: id 是远程实例的内部生成的id。

trans-unit.source: keepalive is the time the connection is kept alive (Optional | Int | Default: 30)
trans-unit.target: keepalive 是保持连接活动的时间（可选| Int |默认： 30 ）

trans-unit.source: key is the channel key to use for the operation. (Required | Str)
trans-unit.target: key 是用于操作的通道键。（必需| Str ）

trans-unit.source: key is the key to the channel. (Required | Str)
trans-unit.target: key 是通道的键。（必需| Str ）

trans-unit.source: key is your master key to use for the operation. (Required | Str)
trans-unit.target: key 是用于操作的主密钥。（必需| Str ）

trans-unit.source: l for load
trans-unit.target: l 负载

trans-unit.source: link is the 2-character name of the link. (Required | Str)
trans-unit.target: link 是链接的2个字符的名称。（必需| Str ）

trans-unit.source: master_key is your master key to use for the operation. (Required | Str)
trans-unit.target: master_key 是用于操作的主密钥。（必需| Str ）

trans-unit.source: message is the message to publish (Required | String)
trans-unit.target: message 是要发布的消息（必需| String ）

trans-unit.source: message is the message to send through the link. (Required | Str)
trans-unit.target: message 是通过链接发送的消息。（必需| Str ）

trans-unit.source: name is the short name for the channel. (Required | Str)
trans-unit.target: name 是通道的简称。（必需| Str ）

trans-unit.source: optional_handler is the handler to insert in the handler trie. (Optional | callable | Default: None)
trans-unit.target: optional_handler 是要插入处理程序特里的处理程序。（可选| callable |默认： None ）

trans-unit.source: options a set of options.
trans-unit.target: options 一组选项。

trans-unit.source: options a set of options. Currently available options are:
trans-unit.target: options 一组选项。当前可用的选项有：

trans-unit.source: p for presence
trans-unit.target: p 存在的p

trans-unit.source: permissions are the permissions associated to the key. (Required | Str)
trans-unit.target: permissions 是与密钥关联的权限。（必需| Str ）

trans-unit.source: port is the port of the emitter broker. (Optional | Int | Default: 443)
trans-unit.target: port 是发射器代理的端口。（可选| Int |默认值： 443 ）

trans-unit.source: r for read
trans-unit.target: r 读

trans-unit.source: s for store
trans-unit.target: s 店面

trans-unit.source: secure whether the connection should be secure. (Optional | Bool | Default: True)
trans-unit.target: secure 的连接是否应该是安全的。（可选| Bool |默认： True ）

trans-unit.source: share_group is the name of the group to join. (Required | Str)
trans-unit.target: share_group 是要加入的组的名称。（必需| Str ）

trans-unit.source: status is whether the broker should send a full status of the channel. (Optional | Bool | Default: False)
trans-unit.target: status 是代理是否应发送频道的完整状态。（可选| Bool |默认值： False ）

trans-unit.source: subscribe whether or not to subscribe to the channel. (Required | Bool)
trans-unit.target: subscribe 是否订阅频道。（必需| Bool ）

trans-unit.source: target_key is the key ban or unban. (Required | Str)
trans-unit.target: target_key 是密钥禁止或取消禁止。（必需| Str ）

trans-unit.source: time is the time of the event as Unix time.
trans-unit.target: time 是事件的时间，与Unix时间相同。

trans-unit.source: ttl is the time to live of the key. 0 means it never expires (Optional | Int | Default: 0)
trans-unit.target: ttl 是关键的生存时间。 0 表示永不过期（可选| Int |默认： 0 ）

trans-unit.source: username is a custom chosen name by the remote instance. Please note that it is optional and check always if this parameter exists.
trans-unit.target: username 是远程实例自定义选择的名称。请注意，它是可选的，并始终检查此参数是否存在。

trans-unit.source: w for write
trans-unit.target: w 写

trans-unit.source: who in case of the event is (un)subscribe one dict with the user id, when the event is status, it is a list with the users. When more than 1000 users at the moment subscribed to the channel, 1000 randomly selected are displayed.
trans-unit.target: who event 是谁，则用用户ID (un)subscribe 一则字典，当 event 为 status 时，它是一个包含用户的列表。当当前有1000个以上的用户订阅该频道时，将显示1000个随机选择的频道。

trans-unit.source: with_at_least_once() to send with QoS1.
trans-unit.target: with_at_least_once() 以QoS1发送。

trans-unit.source: with_at_most_once() to send with QoS0.
trans-unit.target: with_at_most_once() 以QoS0发送。

trans-unit.source: with_last(x) to receive the last x messages stored on the channel.
trans-unit.target: with_last(x) 接收存储在通道上的最后 x 条消息。

trans-unit.source: with_retain() to retain this message.
trans-unit.target: with_retain() 保留此消息。

trans-unit.source: with_ttl(ttl) to set a time to live for the message.
trans-unit.target: with_ttl(ttl) 设置消息的生存时间。

trans-unit.source: without_echo() to tell the broker not to send the message back to this client.
trans-unit.target: without_echo() 告诉代理不要将消息发送回此客户端。

trans-unit.source: x for execute
trans-unit.target: x 执行

trans-unit.source: Describe how to use the trie of handlers for regular messages and presence.
trans-unit.target: 描述如何使用处理程序的trie来处理常规消息和存在。

trans-unit.target: 断开与所连接的Emitter服务器的连接。

trans-unit.source: Emitted either when a presence call was made requesting a status, using the Emitter#presence() function, or when a user subscribed/unsubscribed to the channel and updates were previously requested using again a call to the Emitter#presence() function. Example arguments below.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 Emitter#presence() 函数进行状态呼叫请求状态时，或者当用户预订/取消订阅该频道并且先前再次使用对 Emitter#presence() 函数的调用请求更新时，发出此事件。下面的示例参数。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the client receives a message packet. The message object will be of EmitterMessage class, encapsulating the channel and the payload.
trans-unit.target: 当客户端收到消息包时发出。消息对象将是EmitterMessage类，封装通道和有效负载。

trans-unit.source: Examples
trans-unit.target: 例子

trans-unit.source: If you don't want a secure connection, set the port to 8080, unless your broker is configured differently.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不想要一个安全的连接,就把端口设置为8080,除非你的经纪人有不同的配置。

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.source: License
trans-unit.target: 许可证

trans-unit.source: Note: if you do not provide a handler here, make sure you did set the default handler for all messages using the .on_message property.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果此处未提供处理程序，请确保使用 .on_message 属性为所有消息设置了默认处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Note: if you do not provide a handler here, make sure you did set the default handler for all presence messages using the .on_presence property.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果此处未提供处理程序，请确保已使用 .on_presence 属性为所有状态消息设置了默认处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Property used to get or set the connection handler, that handle events emitted upon successful (re)connection. No arguments provided.
trans-unit.target: 属性用于获取或设置连接处理程序,处理成功(重新)连接时发出的事件。没有提供参数。

trans-unit.source: Property used to get or set the disconnection handler, that handle events emitted after a disconnection. No arguments provided.
trans-unit.target: 属性用于获取或设置断开连接处理程序,处理断开连接后发出的事件。没有提供参数。

trans-unit.source: Property used to get or set the error handler, that handle events emitted when an error occurs following any request. The event comes with a status code and a text message describing the error.
trans-unit.target: 用于获取或设置错误处理程序的属性,该处理程序处理任何请求后发生错误时发出的事件。该事件带有一个状态码和一个描述错误的文本消息。

trans-unit.source: Property used to get or set the handler for .keyban() requests. Here is a sample of the message received after such a request:
trans-unit.target: 用于获取或设置 .keyban() 请求的处理程序的属性。这是在发出这样的请求后收到的消息的示例：

trans-unit.source: Property used to get or set the handler that handle responses to .me() requests. Information provided in the response contains the id of the connection, as well as the links that were established with .link() requests.
trans-unit.target: 用于获取或设置用于处理对 .me() 请求的响应的处理程序的属性。响应中提供的信息包含连接的ID，以及使用 .link() 请求建立的链接。

trans-unit.source: Publishes a message to a particual channel.
trans-unit.target: 将信息发布到一个特定的频道。

trans-unit.source: Python 2: sample-python2.py
trans-unit.target: Python 2：sample-python2.py

trans-unit.source: Python 3: sample-python3.py
trans-unit.target: Python 3：sample-python3.py

trans-unit.source: Requests information about the connection. Information provided in the response contains the id of the connection, as well as the links that were established with .link() requests.
trans-unit.target: 请求有关连接的信息。响应中提供的信息包含连接的ID，以及使用 .link() 请求建立的链接。

trans-unit.source: Returns the payload as a JSON-deserialized dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 返回有效载荷为JSON-deserialized dictionary。

trans-unit.source: Returns the payload as a raw binary buffer.
trans-unit.target: 返回原始二进制缓冲区的有效载荷。

trans-unit.source: Returns the payload as a utf-8 String.
trans-unit.target: 以utf-8 String 形式返回有效负载。

trans-unit.source: Sends a key generation request to the server.
trans-unit.target: 向服务器发送密钥生成请求。

trans-unit.source: Sends a link creation request to the server. This allows for the creation of a link between a short 2-character name and an actual channel. This function no longer allows the creation of a private channel. For this, use .keygen.
trans-unit.target: 将链接创建请求发送到服务器。这允许在短2个字符的名称和实际通道之间创建链接。此功能不再允许创建专用频道。为此，请使用 .keygen 。

trans-unit.source: Sends a message through the link.
trans-unit.target: 通过链接发送消息。

trans-unit.source: Sends a presence request to the server.
trans-unit.target: 向服务器发送存在请求。

trans-unit.source: Sends a request to ban/unban a channel key.
trans-unit.target: 发送禁止/取消禁止一个通道密钥的请求。

trans-unit.source: Subscribes to a particular channel.
trans-unit.target: 订阅某个频道。

trans-unit.source: Subscribes to a particular share group for a channel. A message sent to that channel will be forwarded to only one member of the share group, chosen randomly. For more information about share groups, see Emitter: Load-balance Messages using Subscriber Groups (on YouTube).
trans-unit.target: 订阅频道的特定共享组。发送到该频道的消息将仅转发到随机选择的共享组的一个成员。有关共享组的更多信息，请参阅 发射器：使用订户组的负载平衡消息（在YouTube上）。

trans-unit.source: TODO
trans-unit.target: 待办事项

trans-unit.source: The Client class represents the client connection to an Emitter server.
trans-unit.target: 该 Client 类代表客户端连接到服务器发射。

trans-unit.source: The EmitterMessage class represents a message received from the Emitter server. It contains two properties:
trans-unit.target: 所述 EmitterMessage 类表示从发射器服务器接收到的消息。它包含两个属性：

trans-unit.source: There are some points where the Python libary can be improved:
trans-unit.target: Python libary有一些可以改进的地方。

trans-unit.source: These examples show you the whole communication process.
trans-unit.target: 这些例子向你展示了整个沟通过程。

trans-unit.source: This SDK is available as a pip package. Install with:
trans-unit.target: 该SDK以pip包的形式提供。安装方法

trans-unit.source: This deletes handlers for that channel from the trie.
trans-unit.target: 这将从Trie中删除该通道的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: This library provides a nicer high-level MQTT interface fine-tuned and extended with specific features provided by Emitter. The code uses the Eclipse Paho MQTT Python Client for handling all the network communication and MQTT protocol.
trans-unit.target: 该库提供了一个更好的高级MQTT接口，该接口通过Emitter提供的特定功能进行了微调和扩展。该代码使用Eclipse Paho MQTT Python客户端来处理所有网络通信和MQTT协议。

trans-unit.source: This repository contains a Python client for Emitter (see also Emitter GitHub). Emitter is an open-source real-time communication service for connecting online devices. At its core, emitter.io is a distributed, scalable and fault-tolerant publish-subscribe messaging platform based on MQTT protocol and featuring message storage.
trans-unit.target: 该存储库包含Emitter的Python客户端（另请参见Emitter GitHub）。Emitter是用于连接在线设备的开源实时通信服务。Emitter.io的核心是一个基于MQTT协议并具有消息存储功能的分布式，可伸缩且容错的发布-订阅消息传递平台。

trans-unit.source: To handle connection events, see the .on_connect property.
trans-unit.target: 若要处理连接事件，请参见 .on_connect 属性。

trans-unit.source: To handle disconnection events, see the .on_disconnect property.
trans-unit.target: 若要处理断开连接事件，请参见 .on_disconnect 属性。

trans-unit.source: To handle keyban responses, see the .on_keyban property. It will take a minute for the change to take effect.
trans-unit.target: 要处理键盘响应，请参阅 .on_keyban 属性。更改生效需要一分钟。

trans-unit.source: To handle keygen responses, see the .on_keygen property. Requesting a keygen with an extendable channel creates a private channel.
trans-unit.target: 若要处理密钥生成器响应，请参见 .on_keygen 属性。请求具有可扩展通道的密钥生成程序会创建一个专用通道。

trans-unit.source: To handle the responses, see the .on_me property.
trans-unit.target: 要处理响应，请参见 .on_me 属性。

trans-unit.source: ToDo
trans-unit.target: 待办事项

trans-unit.source: Unsubscribes from a particual channel.
trans-unit.target: 退订某个频道。

trans-unit.source: asObject should return an actual object instead of a dictionary.
trans-unit.target: asObject应该返回一个实际的对象,而不是一个字典。
